title.narrative: Sustainable Management of the Bay of Bengal Large Marine Ecosystem Programme

description.narrative:
Component 1: Sustainable management of fisheries
(SAP theme 1; FAO led) , Component 2: Restoration and conservation of critical marine habitats and protection of biodiversity
(SAP theme 2; FAO led) , Component 3: Management of coastal and marine pollution to improve ecosystem health
(SAP theme 3; ADB led) , Component 4: Improved livelihoods and enhanced resilience of the BOBLME
(SAP theme 4; FAO ADB joint leads) , Component 5: Regional mechanism for planning, coordination, and monitoring of the BOBLME, knowledge management and programme coordination
(SAP crosscutting theme; FAO led) ,Program management cost

participating-org.narrative: Regional and sub regional executing partners include BOBP-IGO, SEAFDEC, IUCN/MFF, UN Environment (e.g. COBSEA, GPA), UNIDO; APFIC; National execution partners include Ministries of Fisheries and Agriculture, Ministries of Environment, and other nationa
